reference.shortdesc: The uicontrol element is used to mark up user interface controls, such as names of buttons, entry fields, menu items, or other objects that allow the user to control the interface.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: Use the uicontrol element inside a menucascade element to identify a sequence of menu choices in a nested menu, such as File New . This element is part of the DITA user interface domain, a special set of DITA elements designed to document user interface tasks, concepts and reference information.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: and keyref.
